channel.title: CVE Feed for keycloak -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for keycloak -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-10686|2024-08-04T11:06:10.651Z -- keycloak -- keycloak
item.description: A flaw was found in Keycloak version 8.0.2 and 9.0.0, and was fixed in Keycloak version 9.0.1, where a malicious user registers as oneself. The attacker could then use the remove devices form to post different credential IDs and possibly remove MFA devices for other users.
